targets.query: SELECT last("ac_current_in")  / 1000 FROM "bess" WHERE ("id"::tag = '1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("ac_current_out") FROM "bess" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("dc_current")  / 1000 FROM "pcs" WHERE ("id"::tag = '0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
